titleStmt.title: John Boyle to Samuel H. Letcher
CWG14185

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
292
>Novr 16" 3.
Capt. Saml. H. Letcher
A. C. M.
Head Qrs. Dist. of Ky.
Sir,

I am instructed by the Governor to request that you muster in
Wm H. Murrell Adjutant 52 Infy.
Wm H. Johnson Qr. Master " "
Geo. W. Wryer Surgeon " "
by in recruiting the Regiment and for the prompt transaction of all other business.

Respy
Your obedt Servant
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
